provisions.title: Article 99 - Commencement
provisions.content: This Law comes into force on the date of publication in the Official Gazette of the Republic of Rwanda. Kigali, on 18/09/2019 (Sé) KAGAME Paul President of the Republic (Sé) Dr. NGIRENTE Edouard Prime Minister Seen and sealed with the Seal of the Republic: (Sé) BUSINGYE Johnston Minister of Justice/Attorney General
